titles.title: Federal Employee Base Closure Retirement Act

To amend title 5, United States Code, to modify the early-retirement reduction provisions with respect to certain Federal employees who are separated from service due to a base closure under title II of the Defense Authorization Amendments and Base Closure and Realignment Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight. Oversight, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 9/21/1995--Introduced. Federal Employee Base Closure Retirement Act - Amends Federal civil service law to modify the early-retirement reduction requirements with respect to certain Federal employees who are law enforcement officers or air traffic controllers and who are separated from service due to a closure or realignment of a military installation under the Defense Authorization Amendments and Base Closure and Realignment Act.
